TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlnsDefinitionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlnsDefinitionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlnsDefinitionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 XAML 命名空間和 CLR 命名空間之間以每個組件為基礎的對應，然後讓 XAML 物件寫入器或 XAML 結構描述內容用於類型解析。

span.span: Specifies a mapping on a per-assembly basis between a XAML namespace and a CLR namespace, which is then used for type resolution by a XAML object writer or XAML schema context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用一或多個屬性至組件，以找出 XAML 用法的組件中的型別。Apply one or more attributes to assemblies in order to identify the types within the assembly for XAML usage. 若要尋找適當回物件項目使用方式或 XAML 檔案中的物件參考的類型，XAML 處理器每個參考組件中搜尋應用程式。To find the appropriate types that back object element usages or object references in a XAML file, a XAML processor searches each referenced assembly for applications. XAML 結構描述內容通常會提供這項資訊。Generally the XAML schema context supplies this information. 在 XAML 檔案中，如果`xmlns`物件項目或屬性項目屬性符合中，XAML 處理器會使用和儲存在針對型別解析組件中的型別。In a XAML file, if the `xmlns` attribute for an object element or property element matches the in the , the XAML processor uses the and stored in the for type resolution against types in the assembly. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

Public Sub New (xmlNamespace As String, clrNamespace As String)

param.name: clrNamespace
param.span: 參考 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 命名空間名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that references a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] namespace name.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與屬性相關聯的組件名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly associated with the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果組件名稱本身的屬性中未設定，您應該判斷屬性套用至組件為基礎的資訊。If the assembly name is not set in the attribute itself, then you should determine the information based on the assembly that the attribute is applied to. 可使用反映 Api，或可能藉由存取 XAML 結構描述內容。This could be done using reflection APIs, or potentially by accessing the XAML schema context.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClrNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ ClrNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個屬性中指定之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 命名空間的字串名稱。

span.span: Gets the string name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] namespace specified in this attribute

value.span: CLR 命名空間，指定為字串。

span.span: The CLR namespace, specified as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ XmlNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個屬性中指定的 XAML 命名空間識別項。

span.span: Gets the XAML namespace identifier specified in this attribute.
